Categories.name: flowflex
Categories.title: Our newest brand
Categories.description: FlowflexTM is the newest brand addition to the ACON product portfolio.  The Flowflex SARS-CoV-2 Rapid Antigen Test is the first in this family of lateral flow testing products.

Categories.name: promotor
Categories.title: Molecular Diagnostics
Categories.description: Nucleic Acid Extraction System and PCR quantitative test kits for HBV, HCV, HPV 16/18, HPV Genotyping, TB and HLA-B27.

Categories.name: foresight
Categories.title: ELISA
Categories.description: Our product offering includes ELISA tests for Infectious Disease, ToRCH, Allergen, Thyroid, Fertilty and Tumor Markers.

Categories.name: acon
Categories.title: Lateral Flow Rapid Test
Categories.description: Reliable qualitative screening for pregnancy, cancer markers and infectious disease including our SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) antibody test.

Categories.name: on-call
Categories.title: Blood glucose meter system
Categories.description: Carefully designed for accuracy and reliability, the On Call® Blood Glucose Meter Family has helped millions of patients worldwide effectively manage their glucose levels.

Categories.name: mission
Categories.title: Point of care testing (POCT)
Categories.description: Our product offering includes a variety of urine reagent test strips, urine analyzers and handheld devices for the measurement of cholesterol, coagulation and hemoglobin.

Categories.name: healthyme
Categories.title: Personal Care tests
Categories.description: HealthyMe is a newly created product line. Our current product offering includes UTI and fertility tests.The product selection is expected to grow with new personal health tests.

Categories.name: distinct
Categories.title: Pregnancy Rapid Tests
Categories.description: Rapid chromatographic immunoassays for the qualitative detection of human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) in urine.

products.name: Promotor® 960 Real Time PCR System
products.caption: The 960 Real-Time PCR System enables you to perform real-time, onboard PCR amplification, reverse transcription-PCR, fluorescence detection, and data analysis. After monitoring fluorescence during nucleic acid amplification, results can be analyzed.
products.description: The 960 Real-Time PCR System enables you to perform real-time, onboard PCR amplification, reverse transcription-PCR, fluorescence detection, and data analysis. After monitoring fluorescence during nucleic acid amplification, results can be analyzed.
bullet_points: Detection of 1 copy of template in a 50 μL reaction
No need for ROX reference dye
No crosstalk between well to well due to special optical system design

tableRows.specifications: Channel 1: FAM, SYBR Green,Channel 2: VIC, HEX, JOE, TET,Channel 3: ROX, Texas Red; Channel 4: CY5
Additional dyes within the wavelength range compatible with the filters are supported
Standard optical 0.2 mL 96-well plates (Semi-skirted, Non-skirted),8-strip 0.2 mL tubes,0.2 mL optical tubes
Detection of 1 copy of template in a 50 μL reaction
Comparative Ct,Standard Curve,Relative Standard Curve,Allelic Discrimination

products.name: ACON® SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test
products.caption: The SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test is a lateral flow chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of antibodies (IgG and IgM) to SARS-CoV-2 in human serum, plasma, or whole blood.
products.description: The SARS-CoV-2 IgG/IgM Rapid Test is a lateral flow chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of antibodies (IgG and IgM) to SARS-CoV-2 in human serum, plasma, or whole blood.

products.name: Promotor® NES-32 Nucleic Acid Extraction Kit
products.caption: The semi-automatic NES-32 nucleic acid extraction system is efficient, easy to operate and offers a throughput of 32 samples per run
products.description: The semi-automatic NES-32 nucleic acid extraction system is efficient, easy to operate and offers a throughput of 32 samples per run. Using magnetic bead technology, the NES-32 can process a variety of specimens, including tissue, blood and other bodily fluids.
bullet_points: Specimens include: Serum, plasma, swab and sputum
The 32 test kit includes 2 Extraction Plates,4 Tip Combs,1 x 700 µL Proteinase K,1 x 700 µL Carrier RNA

bullet_points: Specimens include: Serum, plasma, swab, feces and urine
The 32 test kit includes 2 Extraction Plates,4 Tip Combs,1 x 700 µL Proteinase K,1 x 700 µL Carrier RNA

products.name: SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR Test Kit
products.caption: Qualitative detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2 in oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deepcough sputum specimens collected from individuals suspected of SARS-CoV-2 by their healthcare provider
products.description: Qualitative detection of nucleic acid from SARS-CoV-2 in oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deep cough sputum specimens collected from individuals suspected of SARS-CoV-2 by their healthcare provider.Clinical correlation with patient history and other diagnostic information is necessary to determine patient infection status.
bullet_points: Specimens include Oropharyngeal and nasopharyngeal swabs, and deep cough sputum specimens
Qualitative detection of nucleic acids from SARS-CoV-2
Full-process controls with negative, positive and internal controls

tableRows.specifications: Real-Time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR)
Oropharyngeal swab, nasopharyngeal swab and deep cough sputum

products.name: Promotor® HBV Quantitative PCR Test Kit(Real time)
products.caption: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis B virus in HBV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 20 IU/mL.
products.description: This real-time PCR test kit is for quantitative determination of the hepatitis B virus in HBV-infected individuals. With a high sensitivity of 20 IU/mL, this test kit is an excellent choice for HBV infection diagnosis, treatment decision making and viral load monitoring during antiviral therapy.
bullet_points: Internal quality control: prevents false-negative results
Specificity: no cross-reactivity with HAV, HCV, HEV and HIV
